message: Successfully analysed resume and update the resume in database

overall_strengths.description: Strong understanding of databases and data structures
Hands-on experience in full-stack web development
Good problem-solving skills and competitive programming experience
Basic knowledge of web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React)
Relevant education and coursework in computer science

areas_for_improvement.description: Lack of experience with testing and debugging
Limited experience with TypeScript and modern frontend frameworks (React/Vue/Angular)
No mention of experience with Agile methodologies and version control (Git)
Lack of specific examples of collaboration and teamwork experience

ats_optimization_suggestions.description: Highlight specific achievements and impact in previous projects
Emphasize relevant skills and technologies (e.g., Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB)
Include specific examples of problem-solving and debugging experience
Clearly mention any experience with Agile methodologies and version control (Git)
Quantify achievements and impact in previous projects (e.g., 30% API latency reduction)

job_fit_assessment.notes: The candidate has a strong foundation in computer science, but lacks experience in testing, cloud platforms, and specific modern frontend frameworks. Additionally, they could improve their problem-solving skills and provide more specific examples of collaboration and teamwork experience.

overall_analysis.resume_summary: The candidate has a strong understanding of databases, data structures, and full-stack web development. They have hands-on experience in Java, Python, and JavaScript and have developed multiple projects. However, they lack experience in testing, cloud platforms, and specific modern frontend frameworks, making them a 60% match for the Full Stack Web Developer role.
